pageContext.claim: “We are making your Medicare even better, and we are not letting anyone -- it will never be taken away from you. We're not letting anyone get close. You see these people on the other side? These people are crazy, by the way. They're totally crazy. But they want to take it away and give you lousy healthcare.”
pageContext.analysis: Some leading Democrats support Medicare-for-all -- an expansion, not an end, to Medicare.
